intro: Palicourea siccorubra, commonly known as red-flowered palicourea, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking red flowers, which are clustered in dense inflorescences. Its leaves are typically ovate to elliptical in shape and have a smooth or slightly hairy surface. Palicourea siccorubra is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and undergrowth.
